snippet.title: The Bureau XCOM Declassified Hangar 6 R&D Full Walkthrough Longplay | Commander
snippet.description:
The Bureau XCOM Declassified Hangar 6 R&D full walkthrough on Commander difficulty with no commentary.

💬 Join my Community on Discord: http://bit.ly/Katana-Discord

►►► BASIC INFO ◄◄◄

Game: The Bureau: XCOM Declassified Hangar 6 R&D DLC (2013)
Difficulty: Commander
Deaths: 0
Developer: 2K Marin
Publisher: 2K Games
Plattform played on: PC (Native 4K@60fps, Max. Settings)

I'm going to...

◘ Complete the game on Commander difficulty

►►► TIMELINE ◄◄◄

00:00:00 Intro
00:00:06 Chapter 1: Introductions
Chapter 2: Hangar 1
Chapter 3: Hangar 2
Chapter 4: Hangar 4
Chapter 5: Hangar 2
Chapter 6: Hangar 5
Chapter 7: Hangar 6
Chapter 8: Hangar 6
Chapter 9: Invasion
Chapter 10: Evacuation
Chapter 11: Endgame
Credits
